long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NetacadAutoQuiz is a browser extension designed to automate the quiz-solving process on Cisco’s NetAcad platform. It allows users to quickly review answers to quiz questions, making it especially useful for studying and revising course material. By facilitating easy access to correct answers, NetacadAutoQuiz supports knowledge development, helping users better prepare for exams and deepen their understanding of topics related to computer networking, cybersecurity, and IT.
